title: Where is most music purchased from these days? - Quora

response.answer_text: The current trend in the music industry is for music to no longer be purchased. The model that is being shifted to is streaming music with money being generated by monthly subscription fees. Some music streaming application allow users to enjoy their services without paying fees. Those users are subsidized by advertisers. Popular music streaming sites include Spotify, Amazon Music, Apple Music and Tidal.
